text:
Make a folder `Foo` anywhere on your disk.
open julia and do `]activate ,`
Or start julia with `julia --project=.`

Give it a subdirectory directory called `src`
and a file called `src/Foo.jl`
Possibly you also need to add `name="Foo"` to top of `Project.toml` inside that top directory.
I normally do this all with PkgTemplates even if i am not making a package.


Now you will be able to do `using Foo`
as well as `using` on anything else you have added.
